books.author: by S. C. Stephens
books.description: The success of Kellan’s band poses a challenge to his relationship with Kiera.
books.name: RECKLESS

books.author: by J. Lynn
books.description: Nineteen-year-old Avery Morgansten hopes she can escape the tragedy in her past when she goes to college, but threats follow her.
books.name: WAIT FOR YOU

books.author: by Patricia Briggs
books.description: The shape-shifter Mercy Thompson seeks assistance from an unlikely ally when her mate, the Alpha werewolf Adam Hauptman, and the rest of his pack are abducted.
books.name: FROST BURNED

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: While Alex Cross pursues a Washington serial killer (or killers?), someone is after him.
books.name: ALEX CROSS, RUN

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: An airplane accident and plastic surgery give a woman an astonishing new life; originally published in 1990.
books.name: MIRROR IMAGE

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: A New Hampshire baker grapples with her grandmother’s story of Holocaust survival and the confessions of an elderly German.
books.name: THE STORYTELLER

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: The arrival of a mysterious young woman in a small North Carolina town raises questions about her past.
books.name: SAFE HAVEN

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Justin Scott
books.description: In 1902, the young detective Isaac Bell discovers that provocateurs, not the union members he was hired to investigate, are causing trouble in the coal mines.
books.name: THE STRIKER

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Maeve Binchy
books.description: Guests at an inn by the sea on Ireland’s west coast; the final book by Binchy, who died in 2012.
books.name: A WEEK IN WINTER

books.author: by Karen Kingsbury
books.description: Teenage friends, separated by a move, come together as adults to see whether they can find love.
books.name: THE CHANCE

books.author: by J. D. Robb
books.description: Lt. Eve Dallas investigates the death of a successful accountant; by Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: CALCULATED IN DEATH

books.author: by Abbi Glines
books.description: A sheltered 19-year-old girl falls in love with her spoiled, sexy stepbrother.
books.name: FALLEN TOO FAR

books.author: by Matthew Quick
books.description: A man recently released from a mental institution has two obsessions: his estranged wife and the Philadelphia Eagles. The basis of the movie; originally published in 2009.
books.name: THE SILVER LININGS PLAYBOOK

books.author: by Joel C. Rosenberg
books.description: A C.I.A. operative searches for two nuclear warheads that survived an Israeli attack on Iran.
books.name: DAMASCUS COUNTDOWN
